#summary 栏目管理.
#labels free,cms,freecms,freeteam,开源,免费,内容管理系统

= 栏目管理 =
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">栏目是系统频道某一类内容的集合体。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">您可以在频道中设置多个一级栏目，在一级栏目中添加多个二级栏目......。<span>FreeCMS</span>的栏目设置具有无级分类功能。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>1.<span>    </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">添加一级栏目</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">从左侧管理菜单点击栏目管理进入。</span></p>
<p sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="3">
	<span sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="3" style="font-family: 宋体"><a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123159_Os6C_916014.gif" sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="3" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123159_Os6C_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></span></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击"添加一级栏目"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123241_kRke_916014.gif" sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="4" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123241_kRke_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">输入相关属性点击"保存"即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123258_xtuY_916014.gif" sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="5" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123258_xtuY_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>2.<span>    </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">添加下级栏目</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击需要添加下级栏目的栏目，如"一级栏目"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123318_oyV0_916014.gif" sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="6" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123318_oyV0_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击"添加下级栏目"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123336_UqYx_916014.gif" sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="7" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123336_UqYx_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">填写相关属性后点击"保存"即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123354_HsGb_916014.gif" sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="8" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123354_HsGb_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>3.<span>    </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">改变所属栏目</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">为了方便用户使用，<span>FreeCMS</span>提供了改变栏目结构的简便方法，使您在想对栏目结构作出调整时不需要删除重建栏目。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要改变所属栏目的栏目，如"一级栏目"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123422_oD0f_916014.gif" sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="9" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123422_oD0f_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击"改变所属栏目"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123441_RFpW_916014.gif" sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="10" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123441_RFpW_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要调整的位置，如"要点"，直接点击即可。</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123500_1IXs_916014.gif" sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="11" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123500_1IXs_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体">注意</span></b><span style="font-family: 宋体">：</span></p>
<p>
	<span><span>1）<span> </span></span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体">如果选择站点名称，如"</span><span>FreeCMS</span><span style="font-family: 宋体">"，则此栏目会变为一级栏目。</span></p>
<p>
	<span><span>2）<span> </span></span></span><span style="font-family: 宋体">在改变所属栏目时，此栏目的子栏目不会改变。</span></p>
<p>
	<b><span style="font-family: 宋体"><span>4.<span>    </span></span></span></b><b><span style="font-family: 宋体">删除栏目</span></b></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">删除栏目功能将删除指定栏目及子栏目，此操作不可恢复，请慎重操作。</span></p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">选择需要删除的栏目，如"一级栏目"</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123540_wJj3_916014.gif" sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="12" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123540_wJj3_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">点击"删除"按钮</span></p>
<p>
	<a href="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123557_qzhv_916014.gif" sizcache01420715723275514="7" sizset="13" target="_blank"><img alt="" src="http://static.oschina.net/uploads/space/2012/1226/123557_qzhv_916014.gif" style="cursor: pointer" /></a></p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	 </p>
<p>
	<span style="font-family: 宋体">为会防止用户误操作，系统会提示用户确认，点击"确定"按钮即可。</span></p>
<p>
